languages.text: {n}Абеляр взирает на вас с усталой улыбкой. Он не удерживается от того, чтобы не окинуть вас своим фирменным оценивающим взглядом.{/n} "Ну что же, Лорд-капитан... Моя служба на вас началась в самых что ни на есть выдающихся обстоятельствах, стоит ли удивляться, что вы привели нас в обстоятельства еще более странные и удивительные, чем раньше. В одном я уверен — сегодня династия фон Валанциус покроет себя славой".

{n}Abelard looks at you with a tired smile. He cannot resist giving you his characteristic appraising glance.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My service to you began under the most remarkable circumstances. I should hardly be surprised that you have delivered us into circumstances more unexpected and surprising than ever before. Of one thing I am certain, the von Valancius dynasty will cover itself in glory today."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр взирает на вас с усталой улыбкой. Он не удерживается от того, чтобы не окинуть вас своим фирменным оценивающим взглядом.{/n} "Ну что же, Лорд-капитан... Моя служба на вас началась в самых что ни на есть выдающихся обстоятельствах, стоит ли удивляться, что вы привели нас в обстоятельства еще более странные и удивительные, чем раньше. В одном я уверен — сегодня династия фон Валанциус покроет себя славой".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard looks at you with a tired smile. He can't resist giving you his characteristic appraising glance.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My service to you began under the most remarkable circumstances. I probably should not be surprised that you have delivered us into circumstances more unexpected and surprising than ever before. Of one thing I am certain, the von Valancius dynasty will cover itself in glory today."

{n}Abelard looks at you with a tired smile. He can't resist giving you his characteristic appraising glance.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... {n}Abelard looks at you with a tired smile. He cannot resist giving you his characteristic appraising glance.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... Of one thing I am certain, the von Valancius dynasty will cover itself in glory today."

My service to you began under the most remarkable circumstances. I should hardly be surprised that you have delivered us into circumstances more unexpected and surprising than ever before. Of one thing I am certain, the von Valancius dynasty will cover itself in glory today."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德带着疲惫的微笑看着你，忍不住以他惯有的方式，向你投来了带有评价意味的目光。{/n}“您看，舰长大人……我对您的服务，是在极其不寻常的情况下开始的。至于现在，您把我们置于比以往任何时候都更加令人吃惊、更加令人出乎意料的境地，我对此一点都不意外。有件事情我很肯定——冯·瓦兰修斯王朝今日将沐浴在荣耀之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you with a tired smile. He cannot resist giving you his characteristic appraising glance.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My service to you began under the most remarkable circumstances. I should hardly be surprised that you have delivered us into circumstances more unexpected and surprising than ever before. Of one thing I am certain, the von Valancius dynasty will cover itself in glory today."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德带着疲惫的微笑看着你，忍不住以他惯有的方式，向你投来了带有评价意味的目光。{/n}“您看，舰长大人……我对您的服务，是在极其不寻常的情况下开始的。至于现在，您把我们置于比以往任何时候都更加令人吃惊、更加令人出乎意料的境地，我对此一点都不意外。有件事情我很肯定——冯·瓦兰修斯王朝今日将沐浴在荣耀之中。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard te mira con una sonrisa cansada. No es capaz de resistirse a dedicarte su mirada analítica característica.{/n} «Bueno, Lord Capitán... Mi servicio a su mando comenzó en las circunstancias más irregulares. No debería sorprenderme que nos haya llevado a circunstancias aún más insospechadas y sorprendentes que nunca antes. Si de algo no tengo ninguna duda es de que hoy la dinastía von Valancius se cubrirá de gloria».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you with a tired smile. He cannot resist giving you his characteristic appraising glance.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My service to you began under the most remarkable circumstances. I should hardly be surprised that you have delivered us into circumstances more unexpected and surprising than ever before. Of one thing I am certain, the von Valancius dynasty will cover itself in glory today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te mira con una sonrisa cansada. No es capaz de resistirse a dedicarte su mirada analítica característica.{/n} «Bueno, Lord Capitán... Mi servicio a su mando comenzó en las circunstancias más irregulares. No debería sorprenderme que nos haya llevado a circunstancias aún más insospechadas y sorprendentes que nunca antes. Si de algo no tengo ninguna duda es de que hoy la dinastía von Valancius se cubrirá de gloria».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは疲れた笑みを浮かべてあなたを見つめる。彼特有の鋭い眼差しを、あなたに向けずにはいられないようだ。{/n}「さて、ロード・キャプテン…御身にお仕えし始めたあのころは、非常に驚くような状況でしたね。しかし、それ以上に予期せぬ、驚くべき状況へと我らを導いてくださるとは思ってもみませんでした。ですが、ひとつだけ確信できることがあります。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は今日、栄華に包まれるということです」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you with a tired smile. He cannot resist giving you his characteristic appraising glance.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My service to you began under the most remarkable circumstances. I should hardly be surprised that you have delivered us into circumstances more unexpected and surprising than ever before. Of one thing I am certain, the von Valancius dynasty will cover itself in glory today."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは疲れた笑みを浮かべてあなたを見つめる。彼特有の鋭い眼差しを、あなたに向けずにはいられないようだ。{/n}「さて、ロード・キャプテン…御身にお仕えし始めたあのころは、非常に驚くような状況でしたね。しかし、それ以上に予期せぬ、驚くべき状況へと我らを導いてくださるとは思ってもみませんでした。ですが、ひとつだけ確信できることがあります。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝は今日、栄華に包まれるということです」

languages.text: {n}Abelard blickt dich mit einem müden Lächeln an. Er kann nicht widerstehen, dir seinen charakteristischen prüfenden Blick zuzuwerfen.{/n} "Nun, Lord Captain ... Mein Dienst für Euch hat unter höchst erstaunlichen Umständen begonnen. Es sollte mich nicht wundern, dass Ihr uns in Umstände geführt habt, die noch unerwarteter und überraschender sind als je zuvor. Eines weiß ich gewiss: Die Dynastie von Valancius wird sich heute mit Ruhm kleiden."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you with a tired smile. He cannot resist giving you his characteristic appraising glance.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My service to you began under the most remarkable circumstances. I should hardly be surprised that you have delivered us into circumstances more unexpected and surprising than ever before. Of one thing I am certain, the von Valancius dynasty will cover itself in glory today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard blickt dich mit einem müden Lächeln an. Er kann nicht widerstehen, dir seinen charakteristischen prüfenden Blick zuzuwerfen.{/n} "Nun, Lord Captain ... Mein Dienst für Euch hat unter höchst erstaunlichen Umständen begonnen. Es sollte mich nicht wundern, dass Ihr uns in Umstände geführt habt, die noch unerwarteter und überraschender sind als je zuvor. Eines weiß ich gewiss: Die Dynastie von Valancius wird sich heute mit Ruhm kleiden."

languages.text: {n}Abélard vous adresse un sourire las. Fidèle à ses habitudes, il ne peut résister à la tentation de vous jauger du regard.{/n} « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Mon service sous votre commandement a commencé en des circonstances tout à fait remarquables, et je ne devrais sans doute pas m'étonner que vos menées nous aient placés dans une situation plus surprenante encore. Mais une chose est sûre : aujourd'hui, la dynastie von Valancius va se couvrir de gloire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you with a tired smile. He cannot resist giving you his characteristic appraising glance.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My service to you began under the most remarkable circumstances. I should hardly be surprised that you have delivered us into circumstances more unexpected and surprising than ever before. Of one thing I am certain, the von Valancius dynasty will cover itself in glory today."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard vous adresse un sourire las. Fidèle à ses habitudes, il ne peut résister à la tentation de vous jauger du regard.{/n} « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... Mon service sous votre commandement a commencé en des circonstances tout à fait remarquables, et je ne devrais sans doute pas m'étonner que vos menées nous aient placés dans une situation plus surprenante encore. Mais une chose est sûre : aujourd'hui, la dynastie von Valancius va se couvrir de gloire. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard sana yorgun bir gülümsemeyle bakıyor. Kendine has irdeleyici bakışını sergilemekten kendini alamıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan... Size hizmet etmeye son derece olağanüstü şartlar altında başlamıştım. Bizi getirdiğiniz noktanın öncekinden bile daha beklenmedik ve şaşırtıcı olmasına şaşırmamam gerekir aslında. Tek bir şeyden eminim: Von Valancius hanedanlığı bugün şana ve şerefe doyacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard looks at you with a tired smile. He cannot resist giving you his characteristic appraising glance.{/n} "Well, Lord Captain... My service to you began under the most remarkable circumstances. I should hardly be surprised that you have delivered us into circumstances more unexpected and surprising than ever before. Of one thing I am certain, the von Valancius dynasty will cover itself in glory today."
